description: Data Transfer Object (DTO) class for creating a new note, including fields for title and content, with validation and schema annotations.

classes.name: NoteCreateRequest
classes.description: DTO for creating a new note, encapsulating title and content with validation annotations.

methods.name: getTitle
methods.description: Accessor method for the note's title.

methods.name: setTitle
methods.description: Mutator method to set the note's title.

methods.name: getContent
methods.description: Accessor method for the note's content.

methods.name: setContent
methods.description: Mutator method to set the note's content.
